question: Will carriers offer all Silver plans on the exchange, or just certain Silver plans?
text:
Will carriers offer all Silver plans on the exchange, or just certain Silver plans?
          
        
Insurers can offer different Silver plans, both on and off the marketplace. If the plans are the same, the rates must be the same on Virginia's Insurance Marketplace or off. However, those purchasing off-exchange coverage will not have access to advance premium tax credits or cost sharing reductions.
